paper_abstract: In this paper we give some asymptotic estimates for the best lower bound C(d, k, p) of the 2 Jensen's functional J(f) = integral(2 pi)(0) log vertical bar f(e(i theta))vertical bar d theta/2 pi for when the polynomial f has a concentration d at low degrees k measured by the l(p)-norm under the L(p)-norm, p > 2. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A generalization of Jensen's inequality for polynomials having concentration at low degrees
